meanings.definition: A tool used for smoothing and shaping wood.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a jackplane to make the wooden board smooth.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new jackplane to work on my woodworking projects.
meanings.sent3: Why did the jackplane refuse to work? It was feeling too wooden!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a jackplane, smoothing out the rough edges of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the jackplane filled the workshop, a symphony of woodworking.

meanings.definition: To use a jackplane on wood.
meanings.sent1: He will jackplane the table to make it even.
meanings.sent2: Remember to jackplane in the direction of the wood grain for best results.
meanings.sent3: Why did the woodworker bring a jackplane to the party? To smooth things over!
meanings.sent4: She jackplaned through the project with precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter's hands moved swiftly as he jackplaned the rough edges of the door.
